name: tables
title: Tables
note: This is a standard html <table> markup wrapped in a vs-table custom tag.

options.name: styled
options.description: Adds styling to the table. It's true by default.

options.name: border
options.description: Adds borders on all sides of the table and cells.

options.name: hover
options.description: To enable a hover state on table rows within a <tbody>.

options.name: small
options.description: To make tables more compact by cutting cell padding in half.

options.name: responsive
options.description: Makes table scroll horizontally on small devices (under 768px). When viewing on anything larger than 768px wide, you will not see any difference in these tables.

options.name: striped
options.description: Adds zebra-striping to any table row within the <tbody>.
